home: My name is Edmond Poon and welcome to my website. I'm a Computer Science major at the University of California - Santa Cruz and have an expected graduation date of June 2023. I have the most experience with the Python and C, but have been actively experimenting with others, including C++, Ruby, and Javascript. Some of the technologies/frameworks I have also began exploring include express and react.
This website includes a copy of my resume as well as some of the projects I've worked on thus far.
